\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 29408}

\subsection*{Damn It Burns}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{vitriol}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 20 mg & insufflated & Diphenyl-2-pyrrolidinemethanol & powder / crystals\\
\hline
 T+ 2:00 &   & smoked & Cannabis & \\
\hline
 T+ 4:00 &   & smoked & Cannabis & \\
\hline
 T+ 7:00 & 1 mg & oral & Pharms - Clonazepam & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 150.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Thank to the links in the online synth ref I managed to avoid guessing the right dosage by reading the french patent. Oral dosage being 50-750 mg daly !!!, wow this is usefull now I know that I can not take to much of it !



Anyway let's crush some of those beautifull (R)(+)-Diphenyl-2-pyrrolidinyl-methanol crystal then let's sniff them !



T+0:00.00  nothing !

T+0:00.30  my nose felt cold 

T+0:01.30  then it burn, less than DXM HBr but more than 5-MeO-MiPT   



T+0:02  wow this is like cocaine, of a little less intesse but  close enough !



T+0:15  my nose burn to much for this to be enjoyable, i clean it using sterile isotonic solution. 



T+0:20  I fell much better



T+0:45  initial joy left but still strongly stimulated let's read some Nietzche and some Virgil Gheorghiu to get happier ;)

 

T+2:00  anxious, time to smoke weed !



T+2:05  weed felt weaker but I was more disoriented than usual



T+4:00  anxious, time to smoke weed !



T+6:00  still stimulated but less stronger !



T+7:00  damm it time to sleep, 1mg clonazeparm and good night



I have done this chem many them afterward even if I fell anxious or it burn, it clearly created a strong dependance !

\end{document}
